description:
No Smoking. My place is close to Buses and trains. You’ll love my place because of the coziness. Private entrance, bathroom and kitchenette. My place is good for couples and solo adventurers. No parties or events.

Non Smoking -Private studio apt with separate entrance. Private bathroom and kitchenette ( mini fridge, microwave, dual stovetop and coffee maker) kitchenware and sink. Cable tv, wifi and work desk space.

Separate entrance, private bathroom, kitchenette.

At check in/out, guests will have their privacy unless they need assistance. Guest are expected to leave the space as clean as you have found it .Absolutely NO SMOKING !

Quiet and near buses to subway

Near buses and short ride to subways ( B17 to Utica Ave train station and B47 to Sutter/Rutland Ave Station one block away ) B46 5 short blocks to Utica subway ( 2,3,4,5) 

10 min ride to downtown Brooklyn, Brooklyn Museum, Prospect Park, Botanical Gardens, Barclays Center( home of the Nets) 

less than 20 mins to Manhattan , World Trade Center, Battery Park 

30 mins to 34th street and 42nd street Times Square

B47 and B46 to kings Plaza Mall

Supermarket and Pharmacy is a two block walk.

5 mins walk to Utica Ave where you can find just about anything to eat.

Mike's Diner, Dunkin' Donuts, Wendy's, McDonalds, Popeyes, FKC, White Castle, Chinese, Caribbean, Bakeries, Delhi, etc
name: Cozy studio, private entry and bath
